howToUse.question: How to use the tools?
howToUse.answer: Select the tool you need, upload your file, wait for processing to complete, then download the result. All tools have detailed usage instructions.

security.question: Are files secure?
security.answer: Yes, we use SSL encryption for transmission, and files are automatically deleted within 1 hour after processing to ensure your data security.

formats.question: What file formats are supported?
formats.answer: We support PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, videos, and many other common formats. Please check each tool page for specific supported formats.

fileSize.question: Is there a file size limit?
fileSize.answer: Single file maximum support is 100MB. If you need to process larger files, please contact our technical support.

processingTime.question: How long does processing take?
processingTime.answer: Most files are processed within seconds to minutes, depending on file size and complexity.

support.question: How to get technical support?
support.answer: You can contact us via email, online chat, or by filling out the form above. We will respond to your questions within 24 hours.

help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Find answers, get help, and learn how to use our tools

contact.title: Have other questions?
contact.description: If you haven't found the answer you need, please contact our support team.

howToStart.question: How to start using tools?
howToStart.answer: Select the tool you need, upload your file, wait for processing to complete, then download the result. All tools are free to use without registration.

supportedFormats.question: What file formats are supported?
supportedFormats.answer: We support PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, various image formats (JPG, PNG, GIF, etc.), video formats (MP4, AVI, MOV, etc.), and other common document formats.

fileSize.question: Is there a file size limit?
fileSize.answer: Single file maximum support is 100MB. This limit is sufficient for most daily use scenarios.

fileSafety.question: Are my files safe?
fileSafety.answer: Yes, we use SSL encryption for transmission, and files are automatically deleted within 1 hour after processing. We do not save any of your files.

fileStorage.question: Do you save my files?
fileStorage.answer: No. We do not permanently save your files. All uploaded files are only used for processing and are automatically deleted after completion.

sensitiveFiles.question: Can I process sensitive files?
sensitiveFiles.answer: Although we have strict security measures, we recommend not uploading files containing sensitive information such as passwords, ID numbers, and other personal privacy information.

processingFailed.question: What if processing fails?
processingFailed.answer: If processing fails, please check if the file format is correct and if the file is corrupted. If the problem persists, please contact our technical support.

slowProcessing.question: What if processing is slow?
slowProcessing.answer: Processing speed depends on file size and server load. Large files require more time to process. If there's no response for a long time, please refresh the page and try again.

contactSupport.question: How to contact technical support?
contactSupport.answer: You can contact us via email at support@colletools.com or submit a question on the contact page. We will reply within 24 hours.

processingQuality.question: How is the processing quality?
processingQuality.answer: We use advanced algorithms and technology to ensure high-quality processing results. The effectiveness of different tools may vary depending on the quality of the original file.

ocrAccuracy.question: How accurate is OCR recognition?
ocrAccuracy.answer: OCR recognition accuracy is usually above 95%, but it can be affected by factors such as image quality, fonts, and language.

compressionQuality.question: Does compression affect quality?
compressionQuality.answer: Our compression algorithms maintain quality while reducing file size as much as possible. You can choose different compression levels according to your needs.

about.title: About ColleTools
about.subtitle: We are committed to providing users with simple, fast, and free online tools to make complex file processing easy and simple.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To make it easy for everyone to handle various file formats without installing complex software or having professional skills. We believe technology should serve people and make work more efficient and simpler.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the world's leading online tool platform, providing users with the most comprehensive and reliable file processing solutions, making digital work more convenient.

free.title: Completely Free
free.description: All tools are completely free to use, no registration or subscription required, allowing everyone to enjoy convenient file processing services.

easyToUse.title: Easy to Use
easyToUse.description: Intuitive user interface design with no learning curve, upload files to quickly complete various processing tasks.

secure.title: Secure and Reliable
secure.description: Files are automatically deleted after processing to protect user privacy, using advanced encryption technology to ensure data security.
